description.message: Manage your business on WhatsApp™ Web and send WhatsApp™ messages to your customers

intromsg.message: WhatsApp™ version improved with WhatsDock

newchatphonelabel.message: Send a message to any number

newchatphonelabelcolorfilter.message: Send a mass message to each contact tagged below

newchatphonelabelgroup.message: Send a mass message to each contact of this group

notes_placeholder.message:
Write a comment:
- contact details
- sales opportunities, etc.

phoneinfo_title1.message: 1) Send a message to any number:

phoneinfo_title1_text1.message: WhatsDock let you send a plain text message to any number, even if the number is not in your contact list.

phoneinfo_title1_text2.message: It is a great function for any business to send quick message to your customer.

phoneinfo_title1_text3.message: - Example for a restaurant: "we confirm your reservation for tomorrow"

phoneinfo_title1_text4.message: - Example for a car repair: "Your car is ready to be picked-up"

phoneinfo_title1_text5.message: - Example for a dentist: "we confirm your appointment for tomorrow"

phoneinfo_title1_text6.message: You can even send messages to yourself, and use Whatsapp as a todo list or a reminder.

phoneinfo_title1_text7.message: After you have send a first message in plain text, then you can continue sending messages using all the functionalities of WhatsApp, like picture, link, etc.

phoneinfo_title1_text8.message: CAUTION: never send a message to people who don’t know who you are, they might mark your message as a "spam", and if it happens multiple times, WhatsApp might ban your account. Maximum 25 messages.

phoneinfo_title2_text1.message: To send a message to any number, write the number and add, in front of it, the country code.

phoneinfo_title2_text3.message: - for the USA the country code is +1 > to send a message to the USA number 666000000 then you should write your number as: +1666000000

phoneinfo_title2_text4.message: - for Spain the country code is +34 > to send a message to the Spanish number 666000000 then you should write your number as: +34666000000

phoneinfo_title2_text5.message: - for Brasil the country code is +55 > to send a message to the Brazilian number 666000000 then you should write your number as: +55666000000

phoneinfo_title3.message: 3) Send a message to multiple numbers:

phoneinfo_title3_text1.message: To send a same message to multiple number, separe each number with a coma (,)

phoneinfo_title3_text2.message: Example to send a same message to the following 3 Spanish numbers 666000000 666000001 and 666000000 , use the following format: +34666000000,+34666000001,+34666000002

phonelabellimit.message: You have passed the limit of 25 recipients. Contact us to send more messages at a time.
